resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
kou commented on PR #14208:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14208#issuecomment-1255540391

   Could you enable ORC in our CI jobs?
   
   ```diff
   diff --git a/.github/workflows/cpp.yml b/.github/workflows/cpp.yml
   index 2642a6ec1a..07243ffc4e 100644
   -

github-actions[bot] commented on PR #14208:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14208#issuecomment-1255568295

   :warning: Ticket **has not been started in JIRA**, please click 'Start Progress'.

LouisClt commented on PR #14208:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14208#issuecomment-1255897682

   Hello, I made the changes you suggested. I don't know if this will compile fine as my only compile tests were with vcpkg.

kou commented on code in PR #14208:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14208#discussion_r978992354


##########
ci/appveyor-cpp-build.bat:
##########
@@ -68,6 +68,7 @@ cmake -G "%GENERATOR%" %CMAKE_ARGS% ^
       -DARROW_FLIGHT_SQL=%ARROW_BUILD_FLIGHT_SQL% ^
       -DARROW_GANDIVA=%ARROW_BUILD_GANDIVA% ^
       -DARROW_MIMALLOC=ON ^
+      -DARROW_ORC=ON

Review Comment:
   ```suggestion
         -DARROW_ORC=ON ^
   ```

LouisClt commented on PR #14208:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14208#issuecomment-1256588631

   I can try to fix them, at least for the easy ones. How's that these warnings did not fire before ? It is specific to Visual C++ ?

kou commented on PR #14208:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14208#issuecomment-1256620505

   I think so.

kou commented on PR #14208:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14208#issuecomment-1256623573

   Could you apply this for AppVeyor job?
   
   ```diff
   ```

LouisClt commented on PR #14208:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14208#issuecomment-1259073968

   I made the changes for the AppVeyor job failure. However this still does not work because it can't find a correct version of protobuf (from looking at the logs).
   There is also a problem in the "C++ / AMD64 Windows 2019 C++17" job, it seems it can't find some Zstd symbols during linking.

kou commented on PR #14208:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14208#issuecomment-1276995164

   I've fixed CI failures on AppVeyor and GitHub Actions.
   
   I'll merge this tomorrow if nobody objects it.

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description: ORC support is explicitly disabled in the CmakeLists.txt file, which prevents us to compile Arrow with ORC support on windows (MSVC). The aim will be to remove this limitation.
